title: Help me? Trying to leave silver before the 7th
body:
Hi guys, 

This is my first time here of the forums, and **I was just wondering if anyone knew where I can get someone to coach me?** I know that there are websites that advertise boosting, but I disagree with that. I really would like to improve, and I know of a few things that I should improve on (map awareness and staying in the laning phase too long). 

Also, I don't to sound like every silver player ever, but (at least for the last 10-15 games maybe 20) I have been dying  minimally (TYPICALLY), getting a lot of kills and focusing on objectives. I don't chase kills, I farm under tower when I know I'm behind, I don't play a multitude of champions, and I have pretty good overall game knowledge. 

I tend to duo queue with my friends, but they tend to not do as well as me. I really do enjoy playing with them, but I'm starting to almost feel as though it's a guaranteed loss. 

I'm at a loss here because I know for sure that there are many ways that I can improve, but I cannot seem to gain Lp (just got demoted to Silver 3, first demotion yet). Today was the last straw for me to try and improve based on my own ideas. I watch YouTube videos and actively try and improve but I would really love a "coach" or someone who can view 1/2 of my games in order to help me.

_If any of you know where I can get a service like this, or if there is a community that does this (preferably for free but not solely) I would appreciate it immensely!_

(Last game: 8/2/2 with most cs (235) @32 minutes LOSS
game before that:  8/4/7 9 farm below most (241) @ 35 minutes LOSS
Before that: 8/7/4 with 140 at 29 LOSS (was roaming to help very not-so-great bot lane)
In all of these games I ended up doing the best on the team, objective wise, warding, dmg, dmg taken, gold, cs. I don't want to seem like I am crying about this, but I am seriously looking for some help (I can provide more examples at any time).

Thank you very much, 
Chase {{champion:50}}

replies.body: The subreddit [summoner school](https://www.reddit.com/r/summonerschool/) is dedicated to helping players get better for free, I would highly recommend spending some time there, asking for an op.gg review in the simple questions simple answers thread maybe.
Oh sweet! Thank you very much!

Ayyyy that Summoner School would be a great resource! You might have some good luck looking through [**Player Recruitment**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment) too, maybe someone would be willing to take you under wing ^_^
Thank you as well! I will have to look into it! You all are great:)
Watching this right now! thank you!
Oh I already started watching this guys videos! I guess Im on the right path

well if you dont drink a lot of water and eat when your hungry of course your silver but once you get your health out of the way focus on custom games to improve im tellin you it helps it makes the difference  between a god and a peasant
